page.title: 08Marconi CCSL at Frimley
page.content: Marconi Command and Control Systems are a part of GEC. They design defence systems for the Army and the Royal Navy, including the DN181 rapier systems, and civilian computer control systems. The Frimley site has an area of 7.5 acres and employs over one thousand staff.It has two additional sites in the Frimley area, on the Lyon Way and Albany Park Industrial Estates. The Government is Marconi's main customer. The company is involved with the Government Youth Training Scheme and apprenticeships. Marconi accept about ten apprentices each year for a four year course. Marconi is a very successful company as they have won the Queen's Award for Export.
